name: Special Delivery (itch) (ToxicCatz)
description:
Please play the downloadable version!  The web version performs badly and  also has many visual and audio glitches, so please download the game before rating it!

This game was originally a submission to the 2022 Jame Gam Christmas Edition

Edit One: Since one of the jam hosts said updating your game to fix bugs is allowed, I updated the game to fix the speedrun timer bug and others!

Controls

Most controls are shown in game.

WAccelerate forward
SAccelerate backwards
ASteer left
DSteer right
Left Mouse Button
Shoot presents
Right Mouse Button
BrakeRRestartPRepeat preview Credits

The assets used for this game are from:

Audio & Music: https://opengameart.org/ and https://freesound.org/

Terrain tileset: https://stealthix.itch.io/rpg-nature-tileset

Other art was  done by me
I hope you enjoy the game!
